name: Total Party Kill (DABUOYS)
description:
You play as Rolland Tumble, a light-hearted dodecahedron, bent on destroying the Game Master. 

Loot chests throughout the Greater Lands to power up your dice roll! 

Roll to hit, then roll for damage!

---

Roll your way through a vast array of diverse scenarios. When a campfire appears, make sure to protect it! If your campfire survives the fight, make sure to roll your hit dice at the fire and heal up!
